gaeaActions.sql: CREATE TABLE tbl_test_update (id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, name VARCHAR(50), age INT, score FLOAT)
INSERT INTO tbl_test_update (name, age, score) VALUES ('User1', 30, 80.0), ('User2', 31, 70.0)
UPDATE LOW_PRIORITY IGNORE tbl_test_update SET age = 31 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE tbl_test_update SET name = 'newUser1' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE tbl_test_update SET score = 80.0 WHERE name = 'User2' ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 1
